page.title: 03Ind Coope Brewery (Allied)
page.content: Ind Coope Brewery is one of the two biggest breweries in Burton-on-Trent. They are building a bridge that stretches from the car park to the brewery itself.A few months back they had a new maltings built onto the brewery. Ind Coope are also having another bit built onto the place so they can put the barrels inside.All the car park has been ripped up for the bridge. The top of the maltings has SKOL and lights around with a huge twenty four hour clock. It also gives a digital temperature reading.
